title: Celebrating the Wines of Argentina
itunes:title: Celebrating the Wines of Argentina
description:
Laura Catena, Managing Director at Catena Zapata Winery, discusses the Malbec wine industry and her book Malbec Mon Amour.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Tim Stenovec. Producer: Paul Brennan.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
